verses.text: \w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*. \w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* allow \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* leave \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w lets|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w completely|strong="H3617"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* announce \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* women alike should \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w their|strong="H7592"\w* \w neighbors|strong="H7453"\w* \w for|strong="H7592"\w* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w highly|strong="H3966"\w* regarded \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w officials|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* declared, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w About|strong="H3541"\w* \w midnight|strong="H2676"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* throughout \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1060"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sits|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w girl|strong="H8198"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w mill|strong="H7347"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* well \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cattle.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Such|strong="H3644"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w outcry|strong="H6818"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* heard \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* heard \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* snarl \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* beast.’\f + \fr 11:7 \ft Some translators close this quotation at the end of the verse.\f* \w Then|strong="H4616"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H6395"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distinction|strong="H6395"\w* \w between|strong="H3045"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w yours|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*, saying, ‘\w Go|strong="H3318"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w follow|strong="H7272"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*!’ \w After|strong="H7272"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w*, \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w depart|strong="H3318"\w*.” \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w hot|strong="H2750"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* anger, \w Moses|strong="H3318"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w presence|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \f + \fr 11:10 \ft Or stiffened or strengthened\f* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.
